channel.title: Opensource on Arthur's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Opensource on Arthur's Portfolio

item.title: Building in Public: Why I Share Everything
item.description:
The Scary Decision

A year ago, I made a terrifying commitment: share everything publicly. Every project, every failure, every lesson learned. No cherry-picking wins, no hiding struggles.

It changed everything.

What “Building in Public” Means

It’s not just about posting progress updates. It’s about complete transparency:

  • Sharing code from day one (even when it’s ugly)
  • Documenting failures as thoroughly as successes
  • Live-streaming debugging sessions
  • Publishing revenue numbers
  • Admitting when you have no idea what you’re doing

Why I Started

The Impostor Syndrome Trap

For years, I curated a perfect professional image. Every commit polished, every project spotlight-ready. And I felt like a fraud.

item.title: Neural Dream: AI-Powered Creative Studio
item.description:
The Vision

What if every person could turn their wildest creative visions into reality? Neural Dream bridges the gap between imagination and creation, giving artists and dreamers a powerful AI collaborator that understands intent, style, and emotion.

Why This Matters

Creative tools have always been gatekeepers. Traditional software requires years to master. Neural Dream flips this paradigmâ€”it’s a dialogue with creativity itself.

“The best interface is the one that disappears. Neural Dream lets you focus on what matters: your vision.”
